title: X Games
description: From barefoot waterski jumping to performing stunts on a snowboard, extreme sports have entertained spectators for decades. Some tricks are so extreme, athletes train for years to be able to perform a single stunt! Athletes from around the globe gather each year to amaze and excite spectators. In this book, students will be able to delve into the history of the X Games and learn about how they have evolved over time. This book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events as well as properly use commas in a series.
